description: Independent research is offered for students dedicated to an independent research experience. Emphasis is placed on the iterative process of experimentation and analysis. Students interested in independent research may enroll in BIO 297 or BIO 398. Each course requires a faculty supervisor, who makes the decision as to which course is appropriate. Pass/No Pass. Offered each semester and during January Term. Does not count toward biology major requirements. Prerequisite: approval of instructor.
name: Independent Research (.25, .5, 1.0)
title: Independent Research
